    Publications

    Journal Articles

    1. Heise, T. L., Frense, J., Christianson, L., & Seuring, T. (2021). Using financial incentives to increase physical activity among employees as a strategy of workplace health promotion: protocol for a systematic review. BMJ Open.
    2. Aguayo, G. A., Goetzinger, C., Scibilia, R., Fischer, A., Seuring, T., Tran, V.-T., Ravaud, P., Bereczky, T., Huiart, L., & Fagherazzi, G. (2020). Methods to Generate Innovative Research Ideas and Improve Patient and Public Involvement in Modern Epidemiological Research: a Review, a Patient Viewpoint and Guidelines for Implementation of a Digital Cohort Study (Preprint). Journal of Medical Internet Research. https://doi.org/10.2196/25743
    3. Seuring, T., Serneels, P., Suhrcke, M., & Bachmann, M. (2020). Diabetes, employment and behavioural risk factors in China: Marginal structural models versus fixed effects models. Economics & Human Biology, 39, 100925. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ehb.2020.100925
    4. Lhachimi, S. K., & Seuring, T. (2019). Thou shalt be given... but how? A replication study and extended cost-effectiveness analysis of a randomized experiment on food assistance in Northern Ecuador. Journal of Development Effectiveness, 11(4), 373–390. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1080/19439342.2019.1666901
    5. Seuring, T., Serneels, P., & Suhrcke, M. (2019). The impact of diabetes on labour market outcomes in Mexico: A panel data and biomarker analysis. Social Science & Medicine, 233, 252–261. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.socscimed.2019.05.051
    6. Seuring, T., Marthoenis, Rhode, S., Rogge, L., Rau, H., Besançon, S., Zufry, H., Sofyan, H., & Vollmer, S. (2019). Using peer education to improve diabetes management and outcomes in a low-income setting: a randomized controlled trial. Trials, 20(1), 548. https://doi.org/10.1186/s13063-019-3656-1
    7. McGuire, H. C., Ji, L., Kissimova-Skarbek, K., Whiting, D., Aguirre, F., Zhang, P., Lin, S., Gong, C., Zhao, W., Lu, J., Guo, X., Ji, Y., Seuring, T., Hong, T., Chen, L., Weng, J., & Zhou, Z. (2017). Type 1 diabetes mellitus care and education in China: The 3C study of coverage, cost, and care in Beijing and Shantou. Diabetes Research and Clinical Practice, 129, 32–42. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.diabres.2017.02.027
    8. da Rocha Fernandes, J., Ogurtsova, K., Linnenkamp, U., Guariguata, L., Seuring, T., Zhang, P., Cavan, D., & Makaroff, L. E. (2016). IDF Diabetes Atlas estimates of 2014 global health expenditures on diabetes. Diabetes Research and Clinical Practice, 117, 48–54. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.diabres.2016.04.016
    9. Seuring, T., Archangelidi, O., & Suhrcke, M. (2015). The Economic Costs of Type 2 Diabetes: A Global Systematic Review. PharmacoEconomics, 33(8), 811–831. https://doi.org/10.1007/s40273-015-0268-9
    10. Seuring, T., Goryakin, Y., & Suhrcke, M. (2015). The impact of diabetes on employment in Mexico. Economics & Human Biology, 18, 85–100. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ehb.2015.04.002
